item.title: Using Analytic Hierarchy Process to weight vulnerability scorecard
item.description: Problem Statement: Defining vulnerabilities scorecard weights through expert judgment In humanitarian contexts, it’s not always possible to use a statistically representative dataset in order to infer the relative weights to be used for each criteria from the full vulnerability scorecard. The only options is to use multiple expert judgement in order to Define relative weights to be used for each criteria . Often teams of expert suffer from non-aligned goals, power politics, group dynamics and lack of mutual understanding, which comes though with specific challenges:
